last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Genny has no choice: he must do what Ciro is ordering him to do. And so they set off on a final journey. Locked alone in the cockpit, they will be forced to face their demons.

name: Gomorrah
overview: Based on Robert Saviano's bestselling book, this gritty Italian crime drama paints a portrait of the brutal Neapolitan crime organisation the Camorra, as seen through the eyes of Ciro Di Marzo, the obedient and self- confident right-hand man of the clan's godfather, Pietro Savastano.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Gomorrah is the inside story of fierce Neapolitan crime organisation the Camorra, as seen through the eyes of Ciro, the obedient and self-confident right-hand man of the clan’s godfather, Pietro Savastano, whose loyalty is tested to its limits.

Ciro knows better than anyone what it means to be a loyal clan member. But when Pietro decides to sacrifice many of his own only to make a blood-drenched statement to rival clan boss Salvatore Conte, something dies in Ciro – for one of the many victims of the bloodshed is his foster father Attilio, himself an ever-loyal clan member.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The era of the Savastano clan, who once undisputedly reigned over Naples, seems to be hopelessly over. What lies ahead now is the largest ever power vacuum in the history of the Camorra. The king, Don Pietro Savastano, abdicated, at least momentarily. All the forces involved will suddenly have the chance to have their say and will no longer have to submit to the orders of such a tyrannical boss as Don Pietro. But the latter, although physically and mentally tried by hard prison regime, does not seem willing to lose his empire. Many are now vying for what once was the Savastano kingdom. With Ciro l immortale in the forefront, who from the very beginning will be secretly plotting, testing new and old allies, to finally make the big leap he has always aimed for. A leap which now more than ever seems to be within his reach. Meanwhile Salvatore Conte is now waiting for an answer from the bosses of the clan once close to the Savastano's.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The clash between the Levantes and Patrizia left Naples in a pile of bricks forcing Genny to give up his dream of normality and return to action. But with the police hot on Genny’s heels, he is forced into a bunker alone without Azzurra and Little Pietro. Now, his only ally is 'O Maestrale, the mysterious crime boss of Ponticelli, an eastern district of Naples. War is imminent, and his enemies are fierce, but Genny is about to make a sensational discovery: Ciro Di Marzio is alive in Latvia. And for Genny, nothing will ever be the same again.

episodes.name: The Clan Savastano
episodes.overview: Ciro Di Marzio, right hand man of clan boss Pietro Savastano, and Ciro's fatherly friend Attilio set fire to Salvatore Conte's home to cut Salvatore down to size – him, the ruthless upcoming contender on the Savastano clan's turf.

episodes.name: Do You Trust Me?
episodes.overview: Ciro must sideline his plans for revenge against Conte when there's a bust on the Savastino cocaine shipment.

episodes.name: The Mother and Home
episodes.overview: Ciro is given an opportunity to climb the clan ladder, only to prove that he isn't yet ready to lead.

episodes.name: African Blood
episodes.overview: Imma thinks Pietro should be more concerned when a crack-dealing gang try to leverage their trading terms.

episodes.name: The Roar of the Lioness
episodes.overview: Franco invests in a business venture without telling Pietro, but has to answer to Imma instead.

episodes.name: Spanish Roulette
episodes.overview: While Imma asserts her authority, Ciro embarks on a dangerous mission.

episodes.name: Imma Against All
episodes.overview: Pressure mounts for Imma as she gathers the colonels of the family to explain their new strategy.

episodes.name: White Card
episodes.overview: Ciro looks on as Genny seizes a political opportunity that will enable the clan to manage their business affairs undisturbed.

episodes.name: Green Jasmine
episodes.overview: As Genny plans for the future, Ciro sets his own plan into motion that will cause maximum disruption.

episodes.name: Now We Get Conte
episodes.overview: Genny deals with the fallout when an old enemy is provoked into action.

episodes.name: 100 Ways to Kill
episodes.overview: Conte is out for revenge in the penultimate episode of the series, but will he strike the right target?

episodes.name: The Immortals
episodes.overview: Genny hunts down Ciro intent on revenge. Will he get the justice he craves?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
Gomorrah is the inside story of fierce Neapolitan crime organisation the Camorra, as seen through the eyes of Ciro, the obedient and self-confident right-hand man of the clan’s godfather, Pietro Savastano, whose loyalty is tested to its limits.

Ciro knows better than anyone what it means to be a loyal clan member. But when Pietro decides to sacrifice many of his own only to make a blood-drenched statement to rival clan boss Salvatore Conte, something dies in Ciro – for one of the many victims of the bloodshed is his foster father Attilio, himself an ever-loyal clan member.

episodes.name: My Life
episodes.overview: With Don Pietro in hiding, Ciro collaborates with Salvatore Conte to build a new drug empire.

episodes.name: Blood and Tears
episodes.overview: Having established a new drug empire in Central America, Genny reunites with his father, Don Pietro.

episodes.name: My Fault
episodes.overview: Conte recklessly takes revenge against one of Ciro's men, further weakening their fragile alliance.

episodes.name: Hyena Scent
episodes.overview: Ciro looks to cut a deal with Gennaro when new faces on the streets start causing problems. Meanwhile, Don Pietro returns to Naples.

episodes.name: Eyes to Eyes
episodes.overview: Ciro sets up a parley with Gennaro in order to avoid a full-on gang war. Gennaro agrees, but with strict orders from his father.

episodes.name: O Track
episodes.overview: With the peace talks in tatters, a new breed of Camorrista emerges - one not concerned about breaking time-honoured traditions.

episodes.name: The Prince and the Dwarf
episodes.overview: O'Principe enjoys his rise to power as the head of the new breed of Camorristi. But his celebrity and attitude soon makes him enemies.

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.overview: Following the shocking assassination, Ciro sets out to find the killer while preventing tensions from boiling over.

episodes.name: Seven Years
episodes.overview: Marinella is distraught to hear that Raffaele is getting out of prison. Ciro calls a meeting to divide turf, but not everyone is happy with their cut.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: An increasingly isolated Ciro finds a possible way to sniff out Pietro's hiding place, while the Alliance call some of his decisions into question.

episodes.name: In Joy and In Sorrow
episodes.overview: Pietro prepares to take back control once and for all, as Ciro decides to go into hiding. Meanwhile in Rome, Avitabile suffers a complication in his business.

episodes.name: The End of the Day
episodes.overview: Ciro prepares for all-out war with the Savastano clan, but Pietro finds a way to get to deal his enemy a devastating blow.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The era of the Savastano clan, who once undisputedly reigned over Naples, seems to be hopelessly over. What lies ahead now is the largest ever power vacuum in the history of the Camorra. The king, Don Pietro Savastano, abdicated, at least momentarily. All the forces involved will suddenly have the chance to have their say and will no longer have to submit to the orders of such a tyrannical boss as Don Pietro. But the latter, although physically and mentally tried by hard prison regime, does not seem willing to lose his empire. Many are now vying for what once was the Savastano kingdom. With Ciro l immortale in the forefront, who from the very beginning will be secretly plotting, testing new and old allies, to finally make the big leap he has always aimed for. A leap which now more than ever seems to be within his reach. Meanwhile Salvatore Conte is now waiting for an answer from the bosses of the clan once close to the Savastano's.

episodes.name: Long Live the King!
episodes.overview: After his father died, Genny is in charge now. He has to cover Pietros death and take care of the streets.

episodes.name: To Death
episodes.overview: Genny involves Gegè, his accountant, in his dirty businesses. Don Giuseppe, Genny's father-in-law, comes back from prison.

episodes.name: Hell
episodes.overview: Ciro has rebuilt a new life in Bulgaria, where he has become the trusted man of a drug dealer, Valentin but he has some issues with his new boss' son.

episodes.name: The Thread and the Moira
episodes.overview: Genny tries to close a deal. Scianel gets out of prison.

episodes.name: Blue Blood
episodes.overview: Genny finds Ciro, who has teamed up with Enzo and his crew. Ciro offers Genny his support, and organizes a heist using Enzo and his people.

episodes.name: Like Being Born
episodes.overview: Genny and Ciro's alliance solidifies as they offer an olive branch and opportunity to Scianel, to go against the Federation, with Blue Blood at their disposal.

episodes.name: Blood of My Blood
episodes.overview: Thanks to the advice of Ciro and the contacts of Valerio, Enzo,a young man from Naples opens business in the center of Naples.

episodes.name: Open War
episodes.overview: Enzo and crew are under attack. Ciro convinces him not to react on impulse advising him to come up with a plan to exploit the weaknesses of the opponents.

episodes.name: Judas!
episodes.overview: Blue Blood wins back his grandfather's neighborhood but victory is short-lived and the misfortune compounded when he doesn't listen to Ciro. Genny finds out he must move more quickly against his father-in-law. Ciro faces a choice of whom to ally with. Scianel makes a new alliance.

episodes.name: The Creature
episodes.overview: Avitabile and the Federation make their move. Genny has to prove how high of a price he's willing to pay. Forcella gets a new master. Vocabolario assumes a new role in the Forcella gang, while two of its members get impatient with the new arrangement and freelance on the side. Patrizia continues to be a go-between for both Genny and Scianel.

episodes.name: Faith
episodes.overview: Azzurra and Pietrino have come to be in the Confederate's sights. To save them, Genny is forced to work out a secret plan whose variables are endless.

episodes.name: Forever
episodes.overview: Ciro, Genny and Enzo sign the peace with the Confederates, obtaining part of the territories of the center of Naples. But someone in the shadows plot to send everything to the air.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The death of Ciro tells Genny that the time has come to change his life. Having avoided the war with the Capaccio brothers thanks to the intervention of Uncle, the powerful boss of the hinterland Don Gerlando Levante, Gennaro leaves everything in the hands of his trusted Patrizia. Meanwhile, Enzo calls himself out of the game: he got what he wanted, but he also lost more than he thought he could lose.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A year after Ciro's death, Genny reinvented himself as an entrepreneur. He wants to carry out a great project, but moving into the 'clean' world is harder than expected.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Patrizia is a member of the California State Department of Camorriste di Napoli: in Capaccio e ragazzi di Forcella. You will receive the legendary clan Levante.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Genny and his colleague, Resta partono per Londra, per acquisition of the goods are now subscribed to the progetto, so that they are confronted with the demon sopiti del suo passato.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: To avoid a new war between the clans, Patrizia will have to prove that she has learned what it means to be the regent of the most powerful clan in Napoli.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Someone in the shadows wants to use Nicola, Patrizia's right hand, to question the power structures Genny wanted and set fire to the streets of Napoli.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The general discontent of the Forcella clan begins to undermine the leadership of Sangue Blu. From whom will Enzo have to look to prove he is a real leader?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: An unforeseen event that drags Genny's new company into the spotlight is likely to blow up the construction of the entire airport.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The Capaccos decide to conquer Forcella with harsh attacks on Blue Blood and his men. The most unpredictable of allies will help him.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Patrizia has finally discovered who is behind all her misfortunes. Now he must choose: give in to the patriarchate of the Levant clan or start a war?

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Mickey Levante now has to choose who to take sides with. Genny, who had left Secondigliano in Patrizia to pacify Napoli, begins to be no longer certain of his choice.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: It's time for choices. Who will reign over the smoldering ruins of Napoli bloodied by the clan war?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While Naples is now reduced to rubble, the war between Genny and the Levante brothers proceeds more and more bloody. But Genny is about to discover something that will change all the balance.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In Riga, Genny and Ciro are face to face again, but there is no time to talk. Ciro is in business with the Russians and now that Don Aniello is dead he needs a new broker or the agreements will be blown.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While Ruggieri continues to investigate Genny, the Levante are no longer well received in Secondigliano. Genny tries to take back the neighborhood, but to do so, he needs a load of cocaine.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The Levante and 'O Galantommo team up against Genny and the bosses of Secondigliano who passed with him. Genny, however, already has a counter move ready. Meanwhile, Ciro lets Genny know that he is back.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ciro, Enzo and the others are looking for new allies and Genny takes the opportunity to infiltrate one of his own among the enemy ranks. Meanwhile Nunzia tries to avenge her husband's death.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ciro and the others take refuge in Forcella, but must quickly find a safer place and a new ally. Genny has put a price on their heads and it's only a matter of time.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: After yet another setback, Genny is forced to ask entrepreneurs for money in order to get back on his feet. In the meantime, Ciro and Nunzia receive an unexpected visit.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: To win Ciro's competition, Genny forces his bosses to sell cocaine for half the price. The move seems to work, but Ciro also has something in store for Genny.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Genny is ready to go and pressures Ruggieri to find out where his son has been sent. Meanwhile, Ciro and Nunzia find new and unexpected allies willing to help them.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Genny has no choice: he must do what Ciro is ordering him to do. And so they set off on a final journey. Locked alone in the cockpit, they will be forced to face their demons.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The clash between the Levantes and Patrizia left Naples in a pile of bricks forcing Genny to give up his dream of normality and return to action. But with the police hot on Genny’s heels, he is forced into a bunker alone without Azzurra and Little Pietro. Now, his only ally is 'O Maestrale, the mysterious crime boss of Ponticelli, an eastern district of Naples. War is imminent, and his enemies are fierce, but Genny is about to make a sensational discovery: Ciro Di Marzio is alive in Latvia. And for Genny, nothing will ever be the same again.
